profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on software development and integration tasks (1.A.1) such as delivering applications, working with Salesforce, and developing new functionality. While it mentions exploring and applying GenAI and Conversational AI (1.B.1), these appear to be additions to a core software engineering role rather than the primary focus. The role involves integrating these advanced solutions into existing systems and client requirements, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds or maintains software that uses AI/ML as a core part of its functionality.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development tasks and mentions AI technologies. The classification of the role as 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is well-supported by the emphasis on delivering applications and integrating AI, rather than focusing solely on AI model development. The mention of Salesforce and specific application types solidifies the software engineering aspect. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the depth of AI involvement is described as 'exploring and applying' rather than deep model building.
